authors: Alicia Vrajlal For Daily Mail Australia
description: He is set to compete in the World Tennis Challenge in Adelaide from Tuesday.
title: Mark Philippoussis touches down in Adelaide wife Silvana and son Nicholas
title_page: Mark Philippoussis touches down in Adelaide wife Silvana and son Nicholas | Daily Mail Online
text:
He is set to compete in the World Tennis Challenge in Adelaide later this week.
And Mark Philippoussis has made sure he has his own personal cheer squad on hand to support him courtside.
The 39-year-old Australian tennis player was spotted touching down in Adelaide on Monday with his model wife Silvana and one-year-old son, Nicholas.
Scroll down for video
Family first: Tennis ace Mark Philippoussis was spotted touching down in Adelaide on Monday alongside wife Silvana and one-year-old son Nicholas
Of course saving his tennis whites until it is match time, the dark-haired sportsman wore a black T-shirt as he strolled through the South Victorian airport terminal.
The tennis ace teamed his top with a pair of charcoal shorts, while his look was rounded off with a pair of black trainers.
A backpack no doubt contained his storage essentials, while his mobile phone was firmly held in his left hand.
Mother and son: Silvana was seen carrying little Nicholas the family made their way through the terminal
Look there: The pair's tiny tot was no doubt amused by the sights at the airport
Cool and casual: Mark saved his tennis whites for the court and wore a black T-shirt for his travels
Meanwhile, long-haired Silvana also opted for a relaxed look.
The 29-year-old actress was seen wearing a sleek black top teamed with a pair of ripped jeans.
She wrapped a blue denim jacket around her waist and added a few accessories to complete the casual chic look.
Luggage alert: Mark was in charge of pushing the trolley with the several suitcases
Casual chic: Silvana was seen wearing a sleek black top teamed with a pair of ripped jeans
A Louis Vuitton bag was slung over her left shoulder, while she made her way through the airport in a pair of tan coloured sandals.
In her arms was little Nicholas, looking very much like his father in a blue and white ensemble.
The tiny tot, who is set to turn two next month, wore a white T-shirt, blue jacket and a pair of baby blue shorts.
Mixing it up: A blue denim jacket was wrapped around her waist, and she added a few accessories to complete the casual chic look
Strutting: She made her way through the airport in a pair of tan coloured strappy sandals
Like father like son: Nicholas was a mini-me version of his father in a blue and white ensemble
Mark and Silvana tied the knot in September 2013.
They then went on to welcome Nicholas into the world in February the following year.
The family's arrival in Adelaide comes ahead of the World Tennis Challenge being held in the South Victorian capital city from January 12 to 14.
Mark is said to be taking on Sweden's Mats Wilander and Crotia's Goran Ivanisevic.
Blue and white colour scheme: The tiny tot, who is set to turn two next month, wore a white T-shirt, blue jacket and a pair of baby blue shorts
